bug_fixes: Fixed a bug with the Update app not working properly
Fixed a bug with the Supporter version not installing correctly

new_features: Added new options `Droptop settings >> Options >> Shadows >> Top bar highlight shadow` and `Dropdown highlight shadow`
modifications: Bar will no longer flash when refreshing or on startup
Minor modifications to Windows 12, Tranquil, and Flat & Solid themes
Double middle clicking on the "Beta" icon in the top bar will now remove the icon (Beta version only)
bug_fixes: Fixed bug causing lag when scrolling in dropdown menus
